1÷3    = 0.3333333333333333
1÷30   = 0.0333333333333333
1÷300  = 0.0033333333333333
1÷3000 = 3.333333333333333e-4

2÷5    = 0.4
2÷50   = 0.04
2÷500  = 0.004
2÷5000 = 0.0004

6÷66   = 0.0909090909090909
6÷666  = 0.009009009009009
6÷6666 = 9.000900090009001e-4
6÷66666= 9.000090000900009e-5

1÷8000000000000000 = 1.25e-16
1÷800000000000000  = 1.25e-15
1÷80000000000000   = 0.0000000000000125

56789÷10000 = 5.6789
56789÷1000000000000000 = 0.000000000056789

0.987654321÷1000000000000000 = 9.87654321e-16
0.98765432 ÷1000000000000000 = 9.8765432e-16
0.9876543  ÷1000000000000000 = 9.876543e-16
0.987654   ÷1000000000000000 = 9.87654e-16
0.98765    ÷1000000000000000 = 9.8765e-16
0.9876     ÷1000000000000000 = 9.876e-16
0.987      ÷1000000000000000 = 9.87e-16
0.98       ÷1000000000000000 = 9.8e-16
0.9        ÷1000000000000000 = 0.0000000000000009
